Art. 4.98. 
Obligation to pay the debts and charges of the succession 
The heirs are liable for the debts and charges of the succession, personally for their share, and hypothecarily for the whole, subject to their recourse against their co-heirs, in respect of the share to which they must contribute.
   Instruments enforceable against the deceased are likewise enforceable against the heir personally. However, creditors may not pursue enforcement until eight days after service of these titles on the person or domicile of the heir.
